typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Order as string,
		Client as string,
		Visit as string,
		Site as string,
		{Premises Name} as string,
		Address1 as string,
		Address2 as string,
		Address3 as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		{Item to order} as string,
		{Actual Visit Date} as string,
		{Actual Visit Time} as string,
		{AM / PM} as string,
		{Pass-Fail} as string,
		{Pass-Fail2} as string,
		{Abort Reason} as string,
		{Extra Site 1} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Excel
Excel sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Visit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
